settings.heading: Supporting your seasonal ups and downs with rituals, recipes, and goods.

settings.title: Ritual
settings.description: There is nothing more vital than tending to our mind, body, and spirit. A commitment to nourishing ourselves does not have to be daunting or overcomplicated. Instead, it is through simple, practical rituals that we can find support: a morning herbal tonic, a walk in the sun, a mindful meditation, a soothing bath.

settings.title: Seasonality
settings.description: Just like Nature has its seasons, so do we. We continuously experience ebb and flow throughout our life. Instead of working against our seasonality, we choose to accept our current physical, mental, and emotional state - and nurture it accordingly.

settings.title: Nostalgia
settings.description: We are nostalgic for ways of living and traditional practices that have been lost in the modern day. We envision an ecosystem with a strong sense of community and compassion - while simultaneously utilizing our incredible plant allies to live in harmony with Nature and one another.

settings.title: Play
settings.description: In a world that can be demanding of us in so many ways, play and pleasure are critical to our wellbeing. To counteract feelings of monotony, we encourage imagination and recreation - creating blissful moments, seeking out adventure, and exploring our own interests.

settings.title: About Our Founder
settings.description:
A creative at heart, Leah spent years working in corporate beauty while simultaneously exploring all that Nature had to offer and making lifestyle changes to align with it - from crafting her own skincare to cooking with local seasonal produce to creating a more sustainable, non-toxic home.

Eventually, she discovered the art of soapmaking and its benefits for the skin and environment. This sparked a deeper dive into the world of Herbalism, Cosmetic Chemistry, Aromatherapy, and Natural Perfumery. Blending both her East Coast style sensibility and an appreciation of the West Coast's natural abundance, Leah created BY TIDE to encourage slow living, exploration and play, and practical rituals to support all seasons of our lives.

Originally from Brooklyn, New York, Leah and her partner, Michael, currently reside in the coastal village of Carmel-by-the-Sea with their rescue dog Zoe.
